QuestData.Title: Back to the Sty
QuestData.Description: I try to keep an eye on my stock, but every once in a while some of them sneak away. With all the confusion these virmen are causing, I may have let my guard down for a few moments, and some of my pigs escaped.$b$bCare to look for them? I'd start by looking down the hill, to the west.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found them? There should be three missing, I think.
QuestData.RewardText: There they are! Back into the sty with you three, now!$b$b<Liang looks up at you.>$b$bThank you, neighbor. I'm truly grateful for your assistance.
